named-query.name: User.findAll
named-query.query: select u from User u order by id desc

named-query.name: User.findByName
named-query.query: select u from User u where username=:name

named-query.name: Exhibition.findAll
named-query.query: select e from Exhibition e order by id desc

named-query.name: Exhibition.findById
named-query.query: select e from Exhibition e where id=:id

named-query.name: Exhibition.findByCode
named-query.query: select e from Exhibition e where code=:code

named-query.name: EventSchedule.findByCode
named-query.query: select e from EventSchedule e where e.exhibition.code=:code order by id desc

named-query.name: Sponsor.findByCode

named-query.name: Speaker.findByCode

named-query.name: Exhibitor.findByCode
